name: ts-for-gir-http-example
description: It takes the hassle away from building Gtk4 application in Python So you can create a cool application, without all the boilerplate code

scripts.build:types: npm run ts-for-gir -- generate Soup-3.0 -e gjs --useNamespace -t esm
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:app
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:server
